Approval to authenticate the previous signature as it appears to be genuine without going into the content of the previous document or any further purpose it may be given. page 5

According to a companys declaration, manufactures the in vitro diagnostic products listed on the one-page appendix attached. Such products bear the CE marking pursuant to Directive 98/79/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 October 1998 on in vitro diagnostic medical devices which allows them to be marketed in Spain and in the rest of the European Union countries, with no kind of restrictions on their export. page 5

On the other hand, the company has been certified to the voluntary standard EN-ISO 13485 Medical  devices.  Quality   management   systems.  Requirements   for   regulatory   purposes , which assures the fulfilment of the aforementioned  Directives requirements and which is equivalent to Good Manufacturing Practices required by other countries_ page 5
